mapper.insert: insert into tbl_course (coursekey, usermail, coursename, courseimg, days) values(#{coursekey}, #{usermail}, #{coursename}, #{courseimg}, #{days})
insert into tbl_course_rating (coursekey, usermail, userrating) values (#{coursekey}, #{usermail}, #{userrating});
mapper.select: select course.coursekey, course.usermail, course.coursename, course.good, course.bad, course.regdate, course.updatedate, course.days, course.cost, course.keyword, course.rating, course.del, course.courseimg, board.coursebno from tbl_course course left outer join tbl_course_board board on course.coursekey = board.coursekey where course.usermail = #{usermail} and course.del = 0 order by course.regdate desc
mapper.delete: update tbl_course set del=1 where coursekey=#{coursekey}
mapper.update: update tbl_course set coursename=#{coursename}, days=#{days}, updatedate = now() where coursekey=#{coursekey}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_course where coursekey = #{coursekey}
